title: Tell me about a time you bought new clothes.

korean: 얼마 전에 친구 결혼식 때문에 정장을 샀어요.
평소에는 정장 입을 일이 없어서 한 벌도 없었거든요.
명동에 있는 백화점 가서 여러 브랜드를 둘러봤어요.
처음에는 그냥 검은색 정장 사려고 했는데.
직원분이 네이비가 더 잘 어울린다고 추천해주시더라고요.
입어보니까 확실히 네이비가 더 나아 보였어요.
가격은 좀 비쌌지만 품질이 좋아 보여서 샀어요.
결혼식 날 입고 갔는데 다들 잘 어울린다고 하더라고요.
이제 면접이나 공식 행사 때도 입을 수 있어서 괜찮은 투자였던 것 같아요.
english: Not long ago, I bought a suit for a friend's wedding.
I didn't have a single suit because I normally never have occasions to wear one.
I went to a department store in Myeongdong and looked around several brands.
At first, I was just going to buy a black suit.
But the staff recommended navy, saying it would suit me better.
When I tried it on, navy definitely looked better.
They also helped me pick out a shirt and tie, which was convenient.
The price was a bit expensive, but the quality looked good so I bought it.
I wore it to the wedding and everyone said it looked good on me.
The photos came out well too, and I felt good.
I think it was a good investment because now I can wear it to interviews or official events.
It made me think I should have at least one suit, you know.
